room_title: Escape room "The Genius Test" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: Our group had a great time in the Genius Room today! It was fun and exciting and our host was awesome as well! We’ll be going back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Genius Test" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: Great group activity in Albany. We had 9 people and were able to escape the "Genius Test" with a few minutes to spare. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Will definitely be back to try out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Genius Test" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: The Genius Test was an amazing mind-bender that had the thrill of a timed race, but without the stress of a timed test. I sought to broaden my horizons and I was certainly not disappointed! My compliments to the staff! I highly recommend this activity, especially with friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Genius Test" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: My daughter and her friends had soooo much fun trying to escape the Genius room! Even though they didn’t escape, they will be back for the other room.
